thought: The Slack action parameters are currently empty, so the action does not know which channel to send to or what message to send. I need to set the Slack action parameters properly to send the weather message to the 'weathers' channel with the message text extracted from input_data.
plan: Set Slack action params to select channel by name 'weathers'.
Set messageType to 'text' and text param to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input_data.
Test Slack action separately to verify message sending.
criticism: Without proper params, Slack action cannot send messages. The params must be set correctly for the Slack API to work.

tool_input.comments: Send formatted weather message to Slack channel 'weathers'
